title: Loi pour une République numérique ("Digital Republic Law")
notes: Includes requirements on algorithmic transparency (e.g. explainability in public algorithms).

title: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
notes: EU data protection law with implications for AI (data fairness, automated decision-making rules).

title: Executive Order 13859 ("American AI Initiative")
notes: Trump EO directing federal AI strategy and coordination across agencies.

title: OECD AI Principles
notes: Council Recommendation on AI (47 countries) encouraging trustworthy AI.

title: National Artificial Intelligence Initiative Act
notes: Law establishing a coordinated federal AI R&D and governance program.

title: EU Artificial Intelligence Act (proposal)
notes: European Commission unveils first comprehensive AI regulation.

title: Recommendation on Ethics of Artificial Intelligence
notes: First global AI ethics standard (193 Member States).

title: NYC Local Law 144 (AI Hiring Tool Audit)
notes: City law requiring bias audits of automated employment decision tools (AEDTs).

title: California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA)
notes: State privacy law (Jan 2023) includes enhanced oversight of automated decision-making.

title: Deep Synthesis (Deepfake) Management Regulations
notes: Impose self-assessment and disclosure requirements on online AI services. Bans harmful deepfake uses.

title: Executive Order 14110 ("Safe, Secure, and Trustworthy AI")
notes: Biden EO advancing coordinated US AI governance.

title: Utah Artificial Intelligence Policy Act (H.B. 149)
notes: State law requiring disclosures on generative AI (effective May 1, 2024).

title: EU AI Act passed by European Parliament
notes: Parliament approval; Council approval followed (21 May 2024); in force 1 Aug 2024.

title: Colorado Artificial Intelligence Act (SB24-205)
notes: State AI consumer protection law (effective Feb 1, 2026).

title: EU Artificial Intelligence Act (final adoption)
notes: EU law regulating AI (all uses) by risk level; came into force 1 Aug 2024. Key timeline: 21 Apr 2021 – European Commission formally proposed the regulation; 9 Dec 2023 – European Parliament and Council reached provisional agreement; 12 Jul 2024 – Act published in the Official Journal of the European Union; 1 Aug 2024 – Act entered into force; 2 Feb 2025 – Prohibitions on 'unacceptable risk' AI systems (e.g., social scoring, real-time biometric ID, emotion recognition in workplaces) take effect; 2 Aug 2025 – Obligations for general-purpose AI (GPAI) models (transparency, risk governance) apply; 2 Aug 2026 – General application date for most provisions; 2 Aug 2027 – Certain obligations for high-risk AI systems embedded in regulated products/infrastructures become applicable.

title: Framework Convention on AI (CETS 225)
notes: First international AI treaty opened for signature.

title: FDA Final Guidance on AI-Enabled Medical Devices
notes: FDA guidance for "predetermined change control plans" in AI/ML medical device software.

title: Executive Order 14141 ("AI & Democratic Values")
notes: Biden EO on protecting democracy from AI risks (revoked 20 Jan 2025).

title: Act on Promotion of R&D and Use of AI
notes: Japan's first AI promotion law passed by Diet (soft-law framework).

title: Stop Deepfakes Act (S. 6954A)
notes: NY Senate bill passed requiring provenance data on AI-generated media (awaiting signature).

title: Responsible AI Governance Act (H.B. 140)
notes: Texas AI law signed (effective Jan 1, 2026), covers biometric identifiers, bans AI social scoring.
